attributes.action: use the 'RPI' inflation measure when refering to the 'Inflation Figure'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister and other Government departments keep refering to inflation as the CPI. This does not take account of 19% of household spending:- Housing Costs.
When they refer to inflation the RPI should only be quoted. The CPI can be refered to as; Inflation less Housing Costs
